scMiko 0.1.0
  • Reference

Load parameter specifications for Module 1

m1.analysisParameters.Rd

Load parameter specification list for Module 1 (preprocessing and QC). If not specified, default settings are applied.

Load parameter specification list for Module 1 (preprocessing and QC). If not specified, default settings are applied.

m1.analysisParameters(
  which.data,
  which.strata = NULL,
  organism.filter.flag,
  organism.include,
  save.flag = T,
  save.filename,
  save.directory = "Preprocessed Datasets/",
  set_names = NULL,
  data.imputed.flag = F,
  vars2regress = "percent.mt",
  subsample_factor = 1,
  plt.log.flag = TRUE,
  RNA.upperlimit = 9000,
  RNA.lowerlimit = 200,
  mt.upperlimit = 60,
  cluster.resolution = 0.4,
  print.inline = FALSE
)

m1.analysisParameters(
  which.data,
  which.strata = NULL,
  organism.filter.flag,
  organism.include,
  save.flag = T,
  save.filename,
  save.directory = "Preprocessed Datasets/",
  set_names = NULL,
  data.imputed.flag = F,
  vars2regress = "percent.mt",
  subsample_factor = 1,
  plt.log.flag = TRUE,
  RNA.upperlimit = 9000,
  RNA.lowerlimit = 200,
  mt.upperlimit = 60,
  cluster.resolution = 0.4,
  print.inline = FALSE
)

Arguments

which.data

Character. Specify input data (input file specification are stored in separate data.frame. See Module 1 for details)
which.strata

Character. Specify how input data are subset. Leave unspecified to keep all data.
organism.filter.flag

Logical specifying whether inputs should be filtered by species. Recommended if multiple species are present in input.
organism.include

Character. Which species to include. One of:

  • "Hs" - Human

  • "Mm" - Mouse

  • c("Hs", "Mm") - both species included
save.flag

Logical specifying whether preprocessed data are saved as RData file.
save.filename

Character. Output filename (must include .Rdata suffix)
save.directory

Character. output directory (Default is "Preprocessed Datasets/")
set_names

Optional character. Label for dataset.
data.imputed.flag

Logical specifying wehther data were imputed. Default is F.
vars2regress

Character vector specifying which parameters to regress during data scaling. Default is "percent.mt"
subsample_factor

Numeric [0,1]. Factor used to subsample data. Recommended during initial data exploration, especially if dataset is large.
plt.log.flag

Logical specifying whether QC violin plots are on log scale.
RNA.upperlimit

Numeric. Upper limit for number of genes per cell. Default is 200.
RNA.lowerlimit

Numeric. Lower limit for number of genes per cell. Default is 9000.
mt.upperlimit

Numeric [0,100]. Upper limit for mitochondrial percentage. Default is 60.
cluster.resolution

Resolution used for cell clustering.
print.inline

Logical specifying wheter data are printed in R notebook. Default is F - recommended if generated flexdashboard output.

Value

list

list
